conbody.p: A Binary statement represents a dual expression consisting of two single expressions (variables, strings, numbers, methods...) and an operator, for example: +, -, *, <, <=, !, etc.). For more details about using operators in Groovy, refer to this Groovy documentation: Operators.

li.p: Once a test step is added as any of the control statements, it is not allowed to change into another keyword.
